forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low 8C. SSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning with a few showers possible during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
